channel.title: Server DC:s all the time, help!
channel.description:
Hi, im running a 508 rsps and i have huge problems! Its dcing all the time and i cant figure out why ... Im running on powerfull vps, so that should not be problem with performance.
So my question to you is... how can i fix this and skip dcing on the server ?

item.title: Server DC:s all the time, help!
item.dc:creator: @wayne_tanker wayne tanker
item.description:
@wayne_tanker wrote:

508s arent all that good…and there illegal…try a 317

Read full topic
item.source: Server DC:s all the time, help!
